title: auy
author: auy
content: Have a nice day everyone,friendsI decided to assemble a team to invest together in the current cryptocurrency marketThere will be a group with discussions,ideas and solutions according to the current market situationI have experience in cryptocurrency business since 2015,before 2015 successful deals in US stock marketI gather not just a team of lazy fools who think that they have read two books and already know about cryptocurrency marketI gather a team of real sharks of this businessI want to gather a team with sparkling eyes,great ambition and desire to act,I want to gather real professionals of their business.Despite the fact that I am 35 years old,I have not died out the fire of victory and a great desire to work and developAnd I need the same peopleIn a team there will be no subordinates and chiefs,we all will be united and will help each other,to protect each other from rash actionsThe best proof of your serious attitude will be the capital on your cryptocurrency wallet,even if it sounds cynical,but this is one of the main indicators that one is ready to act and take risksFor more information about me or conditions please send a personal messageI am a very talkative person and explain everything in detail to everyone-God bless you all

comments.author: insidertradingeverywhere
comments.body: Quote from: auy on August 22, 2022, 06:35:37 PMHave a nice day everyone,friendsI decided to assemble a team to invest together in the current cryptocurrency marketThere will be a group with discussions,ideas and solutions according to the current market situationI have experience in cryptocurrency business since 2015,before 2015 successful deals in US stock marketI gather not just a team of lazy fools who think that they have read two books and already know about cryptocurrency marketI gather a team of real sharks of this businessI want to gather a team with sparkling eyes,great ambition and desire to act,I want to gather real professionals of their business.Despite the fact that I am 35 years old,I have not died out the fire of victory and a great desire to work and developAnd I need the same peopleIn a team there will be no subordinates and chiefs,we all will be united and will help each other,to protect each other from rash actionsThe best proof of your serious attitude will be the capital on your cryptocurrency wallet,even if it sounds cynical,but this is one of the main indicators that one is ready to act and take risksFor more information about me or conditions please send a personal messageI am a very talkative person and explain everything in detail to everyone-God bless you allTHE IDEA OF CREATING A GROUP OF LIKE-MINDED PEOPLE IS VERY INTERESTING, BUT WHAT EXACTLY WILL THE GROUP DO?

comments.author: BitcoinGirl.Club
comments.body: Quote from: insidertradingeverywhere on September 21, 2022, 05:16:09 AMBUT WHAT EXACTLY WILL THE GROUP DO?OP already explained it.Quote[...]There will be a group with discussions,ideas and solutions according to the current market situation[...]I want to gather a team with sparkling eyes,great ambition and desire to act,I want to gather real professionals of their business.[...]auy, why would someone trust your words? I think you should show some portfolio that you are capable of what you are claiming and have done such things before.

comments.author: xzy887
comments.body: Your thoughts are very good. Team up with people who have good experience with this cryptocurrency. But those who have good experience with crypto and currency won't believe you easily. Because they know there are many scammers in this cryptocurrency. And they will never listen to you so they will never believe you without proof. What is the proof that you are trustworthy and that you have experience in this matter?

comments.author: palle11
comments.body: Quote from: auy on August 22, 2022, 06:35:37 PMIn a team there will be no subordinates and chiefsNot true because a business or gathering of people must have different stratas and cadar that will play different rolls and assignment to the progress of the whole unit. Therefore, if you say such, it means you don't understand exactly what you are saying or you just want to sweet tongue people to send pm to you and you start your nefarious activities from the pm. No everyone is not the same and can't be equal. Quote from: auy on August 22, 2022, 06:35:37 PMwe all will be united and will help each other,to protect each other from rash actionsThere is no guarantee for that. Assembly of people doesn't really go as planned because of different ideas, interest etc. No matter how positive it is, there could be rift somewhere, even stake.com casino can be used as an example as the partners having little allegation issues.

comments.author: cheezcarls
comments.body: Quote from: auy on August 22, 2022, 06:35:37 PMHave a nice day everyone,friendsI decided to assemble a team to invest together in the current cryptocurrency marketThere will be a group with discussions,ideas and solutions according to the current market situationI have experience in cryptocurrency business since 2015,before 2015 successful deals in US stock marketI gather not just a team of lazy fools who think that they have read two books and already know about cryptocurrency marketI gather a team of real sharks of this businessI want to gather a team with sparkling eyes,great ambition and desire to act,I want to gather real professionals of their business.Despite the fact that I am 35 years old,I have not died out the fire of victory and a great desire to work and developAnd I need the same peopleIn a team there will be no subordinates and chiefs,we all will be united and will help each other,to protect each other from rash actionsThe best proof of your serious attitude will be the capital on your cryptocurrency wallet,even if it sounds cynical,but this is one of the main indicators that one is ready to act and take risksFor more information about me or conditions please send a personal messageI am a very talkative person and explain everything in detail to everyone-God bless you allI honestly think that this is some kind of a “joint venture” or “partnership” type of topic that you have just started here. It means that you have posted in the wrong section. I think the appropriate section is through “Project Development”, but mods correct me if I’m wrong though. And of course, you need some proof or portfolio on why we should be trusting you rather than just convincing with your own words. It’s not good if you only send the details via PM. If you think that you’re legit, you should not hesitate to showcase your portfolio in this thread.

comments.author: rozak
comments.body: Quote from: cheezcarls on September 21, 2022, 12:25:45 PMIt’s not good if you only send the details via PM. If you think that you’re legit, you should not hesitate to showcase your portfolio in this thread. I'm sure he has already spread PM to several members who are active in the Trading Discussion thread. Turns out it's true, it's not just me or you. maybe OP has spread spam PM to many members.At first, I thought he was inviting me to join a trading group. maybe some kind of group for analysis or signals in general that we see often.but there is also a possibility that he invites us to invest in a joint project.someone professional wouldn't do this. unbelievable.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Sending PM to many active members in the trading discussion thread makes it look a bit suspicious, if you want to create an active group of members who are passionate about technical analysis and have good trading ideas this should be done in the thread here in front of everyone and not in a personal message, you sent a PM to many members (including me) and you don't know anything about their trading experience and you didn't see their portfolio, how did you choose them? So it seems a little fishy to me.

comments.author: Quidat
comments.body: Quote from: yhiaali3 on September 21, 2022, 07:12:35 PMSending PM to many active members in the trading discussion thread makes it look a bit suspicious, if you want to create an active group of members who are passionate about technical analysis and have good trading ideas this should be done in the thread here in front of everyone and not in a personal message, you sent a PM to many members (including me) and you don't know anything about their trading experience and you didn't see their portfolio, how did you choose them? So it seems a little fishy to me.Spamming out something on PM's is never been that good to look at but rather ending up on those suspicious kind of impression of people whom do recieved the message.Its true that its better to invite nor convince people on this thread itself and not just forcing them and sending out pm 1 by 1 which wont really be that effective and as saidthat you dont know their real trade experience or portfolio which it is really that somewhat pointless on sending messages randomly and asking if they would join upon a group or not.Expect that there would be no people would be doing such thing.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: I have received one of your messages and seriously, I don’t trust any offer like his or any services like this, it’s kinda suspicious since you are sending messages in general. If you want to offer services then do this professionally, there is no need for you to message everyone you see as qualified. To avoid this stop spamming our messages, start making a thread that is more worth it, I doubt that many will join that so called team for traders.

comments.author: Mr.right85
comments.body: I have heard of cloud mining, where miners gets to pull in there resources together to mine and get to share the block reward when they win.Having the same idea about trading is good but how would you do that on a global range and with anonymous users?How would you be sure the other party did his or her homework and its good enough for you guys to invest as a team?What  happens when an individual refuses to pull in a fixed amount of funds to take up an investment and should the funds not be fixed, any individual could not do his or her homework and knowing fully chooses not to dedicate more funds as it is rubbish.You could come up with some good models to make this work bit the odds of doing this with unknown individuals are against the idea.

comments.author: auy
comments.body: So,hello everyoneYes,indeed,I gather a team of like-minded people,but interest in this topic was not about a month,so I decided to write a private message to allSorry if I offended anyone with that,I didn't mean toI'm not a spammer,not a scammer,I do not and have never offered anyone to invest in any projectI think that it is stupid and pointless to look for investors in such a wayAnd excuse me for my excessive secrecyI had a lot of money stolen a year ago and I stopped trusting absolutely all peoplePerhaps I did something wrong,but I have found no other way to contact you
